resources.string: Screen Color Control is an app made to offer advanced control over the screen colour of smart devices having KCAL/K-lapse support.

Thank you very much for supporting the developer by allowing Ads!\n\nHowever, please be noted that allowing Ads sometimes results weired behaviour. If you encounter any such issues, feel free to disable it.
Automatically set the brightness factor in a set time range.

Congrats! Ads will be disabled soon!\n\nHowever, please be noted that the revenue obtained from these Ads are really helpful for the developer to continue his android development projects more active. If it doesn\'t hurt you much, please consider allowing the Ads to support the development.
\nIf you like to appreciate my work, please consider donating to me as it is helpful to continue my projects more active, although it is not at all necessary.\n
\nPlease note: I can accept donations either via PayPal, or through SmartPack Donation Package in PlayStore.\n
Want to appreciate my work with a Donation? Click here
The number of minutes before End Time when RGB should start going back to Daytime colors.
The amount of milliseconds after which 1 RGB frame is shifted.
Kernel-based Lapse ("K-lapse") is a linear RGB scaling module that shifts RGB based on time or brightness (<a href="https://github.com/tanish2k09/KLapse-Livedisplay">Read More<a>).
Your kernel doesn\'t seems to have %s support. Hence, this app doesn\'t work properly on your device unless you install a supported Custom Kernel.

Why this issue happened?

Your device is either not rooted, or the root permission is declined for Screen Color Control by you!


Why root permission needed?

In order to control KCAL/K-lapse parameters, Screen Color Control need to modify some system files, that are not accessible without root!


How can I root my device?

A simple google search will help to find many guides to achieve root on your device. Please have a look at it!


Is rooting a device safe?

Rooting poses some security risk, but it's generally safe to do!
This page offers you to tweak few more advanced display settings, such as Saturation Hue, Saturation, Intensity, etc.
Permission denied for writing to storage!
Visit Screen Color Control page on PlayStore
A profile named %s is already exists! Aborting.
In this section, you can create, import, view and easily apply Screen Color profiles within few clicks.
The number of milliseconds after which klapse_pulse is called.
Controls how soon the RGB reaches from Daytime to Night Mode inside of start and stop hour range.
Control the color of your smart device screen with the help of KCAL advanced color control interface.
Share Screen Color Control with your friends

Get Screen Color Control v%s from\nPlayStore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smartpack.colorcontrol\nGitHub: https://github.com/SmartPack/ScreenColorControl/raw/master/release/com.smartpack.colorcontrol.apk
To apply this script, simply download the file and import into Screen Color Control -> Profiles.\n
Due to the K-lapse time schedule settings, it will take some time to get this change in full effect. For immediate effect, please disable K-Lapse and try again.
Failed to get latest version information!
Check for a new versions of Screen Color Control
